name: Silent Hill: The Escape
description: The noises... the fog... it's all coming back...The "Silent Hill" series that terrified the world with over 5.3 million copies sold, has returned now on – the iPhone/iPod touch.Under the guidance of a dull, flickering flashlight, find the exit and search for safety before you run out of bullets.Escape the suspense with full use of the touch panel and confront evil with the accelerometer...Or be trapped forever in the labyrinth with the creatures?
